div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xiijo die mensis Augusti anno quo supra et cetera

The said day the prouest grantit that he ressauit fra Andro
fiff ane barrell of salmond' of the gret bind of his girssom'
to help to pay Sanct nicholes' led' and' the maill of this
yeir of ane half nethis fischingis of the raik /

The said day the prouest grantit that he ressauit fra thomas
chamer in barrellis of salmond' of his girssome of ane half nethis
fischingis of the rak and' of the gardin to compt and raknyng'

Curia balliuorum bugj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvjo die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The said day William' loremar grant him to pay to William
smytht xl s' for ane stedy at mydsymmir day that nixt cummis

The said day thomas storour lauchfully warnit callit and'
nocht comperit to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Alexander
prat for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xxxiiij s' for
ane hors' bocht and ressauit be him fra the said Alexander herfor
the bailyes chargit Androw nachtj officiar to tak ane strace of the
said thomas and lat it to borgh' gif it be askit and' warn' him
to this day xv dais at thrid day of proces'

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xixo die mensis Augusti Anno quo supra et cetera

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod mariota
Dow est filia legittima et propinquior heres quondam Dauid Dow patris suj
burgensis dicti burgi

The saide day thir personis Accusit for Spilling of the mercat et cetera
that is to say the wif of hay Sangstar cristiane Westland'
the wif of hay Canny meldrum Jonet henry the
wif of flessour meg Dovny the wif of Androw vmfray
the wif of Androw bavne the wif of gilbert prestone the wif
of Androw cromy the wif of morys' talyour Ellene sclatar
the wif of Johne fynne the wif of Androw smitht the wif
of michele bevmonde the wif of Richerd redhed' Canny
talyour denyit And' thareftir it was put to the decisione of ane
assis' quhilkis riplie auisit fand' and deliuerit that thai coud' nocht
acquyt the said' personis of Spilling of the mercat for the
quhilkis Ilkan of tham was in amerciament of the court et cetera for the
quhilkis It was ordanit be the said assis' that the sad personis
salbe expellit and forbodin the mercat quhile eftir michelmes' day
vndir the pane of brekin of commone ordinance Ande the balyeis
sale caus' ane officiar' to keip the mercat euere mercat day
and about

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiijo die
mensis Augustj Anno quo supra

The said day Waltir schammell Inglisman was in ane amerciament of the court be his
avin toung grant for the tribulance of the burgh of Abirdean' vnder cilence of the nycht
To amend as law will and forbeir in tyme to cum et cetera

The said day Johnne Scrogis witht James colisone his forspekar complenit
to the bailyeis that Waltir sammall Inglisman hed tribulit him and dravin
blud of him wranguisly vnder cilence of the nicht quhilk tribulance the sad
Waltir denyt And elikuis the said Johnne Waltir complenit that the said
Johnne hed tribulit him and dravin blud of him vnder silence of the nicht
quhilk the said Johnne denyit And' incontinent thareftir witht consent of baitht
the said partiis the saidis actionis and accusacionis was put to the desicioun'
of thir personis that is to say Alexander gray patry reid Alexander menyeis
Johnne Kintor patry lesly youngar Duncan fif henry reid gavane mur
ray William Kintor Androw lousoun' William murray Johnne moir Johne crak
Androw Stratoun' Dauid arrot gilbert litstar Androw Stevinsone Dun
can crak Johnne Wilyongsone Johnne malisoun' elder Androw meldrum Johnne'
malisoun' yongar and Dauid straloch' burges of the said burgh' Quhilkis
Riply auisit the gret aitht Suorn' in ane assis' fand and deliuerit the richtis
resonis and allegacionis witnes and' previs of baitht the said partiis herd' sen'
and vnderstandin be the moutht of the said Alexander gray forspekar
of the said assis' that thai culd' nocht acquyt the said Walter of tribulance of
the said Johnne Knollis and blud draving of him wranguisly vnder cilence
of the nicht for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and' to
amend' as law will and' forber in tyme to cum et cetera And the said Johnne
that thai culd' nocht acquyt for tribulance of the said Walter vnder cilence
of the nycht for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament and' of the court and'
to amend' as law will and' forber in tyme to cum et cetera And' atour thai fand'
that the prouocacioun' of the said tribulance was in the said Waltir schammell
Inglisman and movit first of him

The said day Dauid steuart lauchfully warnit callit and nocht comperit to ansuer to the borgh'
fundin one him be Johnne murray for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ij franche cronis xliiij
eduard' grotis and demi Inglis grot tharfor the bailyes chargit William scrimgeour to tak a
stras' of the sad Dauid and latit to borgh gif it be askit and' warn' him to
this day xv dais as ferd' day of proces'

The said day James colisone requirit the balyes that thai wauld'
tak Sufficient souerte of the said Waltir till reman' and' vnderly
our Soueran' lordis lawis / for the said' Cryme allegeand that he hed
forfaltit his conduct' and' till arrest his schip and gudis pertenyng
tharto for our Souerane lordis profit And' thareftir patry lesly eldar come souerte be his hand landis and
gudis that the said Walter sale Reman to be responsall for his persoun'
in the premiss' And' the said Walter oblist him to releif the said'
patry of the said caucioun'

The said day patry lesly forspekar for Walter schammell Inglisman
allegit him reddy to saill and' the schip quharin he suld' saill was
reddy to saill with part of his gudis vthir scottis men' and Inglismennis
gudis requirand the bailyeis that thai wauld' diuis' and tak suffi
cient emendis of the said Walter for his traspas offering him red
dy till vnderly thar ordinance and' command' of the best and worthi
ast of the toun' furthtwith but delay protestand gif the said schip
and gudis was stopit fra the mercat and sustenit skaitht tharthrow
that thai mycht haue thair costis skaithtis and' expensis of the causar
of the samyne And' the balyes declarit thai hed' na pouer
to freitht the said Waltir schip nor gudis becaus the said'
actioun' pertenis to our souerane lordis hienes

Eodem die nicholayus ramsay conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
patricij leslie senioris pro perturbio Johannis andirsone in domo propria Et Idem
Johannes conuictus fuit pro perturbio ipsius nicholaij et quilibet alteri emendabit
ut Jura volunt Et elizabetht thane conuicta fuit pro perturbio dicti
nicholaij et Idem nicholaius conuictus fuit pro perturbio ipsius Elizi
betht et vtraque pars emendabit ut Jura volunt Infra prouocacio
fuit in dicto nicholayo

The saide day James Colisone Duncan Colisone gilbert litster and Duncan fyf
was oblist thame faithtfullie to Ende the debatis betuix Alexander mathe
sone and patry ponty

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvij die / mensis
Augusti anno quo supra

The said day the prouest chrgit and requirit the bailyes to warne ale the cou
paris and' broustaris within this burgh' that is to say the couparis for making of
barellis nocht according to the rychtuis' bind and the broustaris for selling of
xij d' all and' to punys thame for the samyne eftir the forme of lawe et cetera
And' thareftir the balyes grantit to fulfill the samyne safar as thai may get
witting and' knavlege tharof

The said day Dauid grige was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Alexander
menyeis forspekar for the tribulance of Johnne buchane for the quhilkis he was
in ane amerciament of the court and to amend as law will and forbeir in
tyme to cum et cetera And' the said Dauid to pay v s' for the leching of the said Johne
and' to pay fourty s' to Sanct nicholes wark / gif euere he happinis
to do sic tribulance in tyme to cum and' the said Johnne buchane quyt
of ale tribulance of the said Dauid grige

The said day Dauid grig was conuict be the said assis' Alexander menyeis for
spekar for the tribulance of henry nicholsone and' the said henry for
tribulance of the said Dauid for the quhilkis Ilkan' of thame was in
ane amerciament of the court and' to amend' as law will and' forber in tym
to cum and that was gevin for dome

The said day Duke andersone cordinar and' Jok crukschank was conuict
be ane suorne assis' Alexander menyeis forspekar for the tribulance of William
colly forspekar skynner for the quhilkis thai wat in ane amerciament of the court
et cetera and the saidis Duke and Jok sale pay the leicht for the mending
of the said William and that thar mastiris hald samekle' of thair feis as
accordis to the leching of the said William And' gif euire thai be findin
in sic ane falt in tyme to cum to be expellit the tone And' the said
William colly quyt of ale tribulance of the said' Duncan' and Johne'

The said day James strathathin in the name of his wif the wif
of Androw lousone and' nanne Kintor Ilkane of thame was conuict'
be thar avin toung grant for the selling of xij d' aill for
the quhilkis thai war in ane amerciament of the court and to amend'
as law will and' forber in tyme to cum

The said day adame fif come souerte and' lawborrowis be
his hand and gudis that the Dauid Johnne' buchane salbe
harmles and skathtles of Dauid grig ale wais bot as
law will / And' the said Dauid oblist him to releif the said'
adam of the said law borrowis

The said day Dauid stralocht come souerte and' lawburrowis
be his hand landis and gudis that thome menyeis salbe harmes and
skathles of Duncan fif ale wais bot as law will And' patry
lesly com' souerte be his hand landis and gudis that the said Duncan
salbe harmles and skathles of the said thomas ale wais bot as law
will And' the saidis Duncan and thomas oblist tham be the fathtis
of thar bodiis to relef the saidis Dauid and patry of the said law
borrowis et cetera

The said' day comperit in Jugement mariory fyf the Relict of vmquhile
Dauid Iruyn grauntit sche hed' sauld' ane young cowe of vthir half yer'
ald' tile Androw lousone burges of the said' burghe for certane Some of money
pait to hir' in novmerit money and in the commone oppin' mercat of Abirdene And'
the said' mariory deponit the gret aithe that the said' cow was hir' avne
propir gude and was callit in hir' avne possessioun' and aucht and oblist hir
and hir' ayris executoris and assignez to ward' kep and defend' the said' cow to the
said' Androw and kepe him and tham Skathtles tharanent now and foreuire

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo die
Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day Androw cullane prouest of the said' burghe' grauntit him to
haue resauit be the handis of thomas chamer tene pundis fyve tene Schillingis
and v d' for his grissome of ane half nethis fischingis of the Raik
and for the girssome of the landis of the gardin Set' to him for the termes
of fyve yeris as Is contenit in the generale assedacioun' of the saide burghe
vndir the commone Sele maide tharapone Of the quhilkis money the saide
prouest in the nayme of the saide burghe' halde him wele content and pait
Ande dischargit and quietclamit the saide thomas his ayris executoris and assignez'
tharof for the said' prouest balyeis Consale and communite and thar Successoris
nowe and foreuere

The said day the bai prouest and bailyes assignit friday that nixt cumis to James
colisoun' one that ane part and patry lesly one that vthir part to compeir befor tham'
for ministracioun' of Justice anent the assedacioun' of ane croft And' eftir the tenour
of our Souerance lordis lettres dicrect' tharupone equaly to be done bringand' with
thame sic euidencis and' documentis as thai will wse in the said matir

Prouest ande bailyeis of Abirdene I commend' me to yow et cetera with ye that Walter schallar Inglis
man berar heirof has contentit ande applesit his party and as for the Kingis
actioun' tharthrow that ye molest nor inquiet him nocht tharfor / for It the command'
of the quenis grace and tharfor that ye lous' the arrestment of the schip and gudis
pertenyng to him and mak thame to be fre to him as for the said' actioun'
Ande god' kepe you at Edinburgh' the xxvj day of August et cetera

The said day the prouest and bailyeis lousit the arrestment maid' apone the said'
Inglismannis schipe and gudis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vltimo die mensis Augusti Anno quo supra

The said day the haile tone warnit be the handbell gatherit and circualy
Inquerit be Williame scrimgeour officiar consentit to send commisaris
for the making of the stapill in medilburgh' or the weir et cetera and'
chesit Androw elphinstone of selmis Androw cullan prouest Dauid menyeis
Johnne lesly of Warderis and Johnne of cullane and' ordand an'
commissioun' to be maid to tham vndir thar commone seill tharupon' in
dew forme et cetera

Eodem die Johannes crukschank crak curatus Johannis cruckschank
fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordinauit Johanne mar et dominum Willelmum
andirsone coniunctim dantes et concedentes eisdem suam plenariam potestatem
et mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad prosequendum robertum Wal
car pro bonis Jure hereditario pertinenciis dicto Johanni crukschank
promittens de rato et grato et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis
Septembris Anno domini et cetera quingentesimo septimo

The said day Comperit James collisone burges of the said burgh' and Requirit the ballies
to minister Justice to him anent the occupacioun' and manuring of ane croft pertenyng to
him in heretag be patrik lesly without tak or assedacioune of him or of James hill
fra quhome he conqueist the said croft eftir the tenour of our Souerane lordis lettres direct'
tharapoune as day assignit to baitht the said partijs for ministracioun' of Justice And thareftir
the ballies accusit the said patrik personaly present for the wranguis' Manuring and
occupacioun' of the said croft with tak or assedacioun' as said is quhilkis the said
patrik oppinly denyit And thareftir the said actioun' was put to the decisioun'
of ane assis' of thir personis vnder writin that is to say Alexander gray patry Reid
mathou branche Dauid mar Androw lowsone alexander malisone Willeame Kintor
Robert Waus William Rolland Dauid murray Johnne crak and alexander hay burges
of the said burgh' quhilkis riplie avisit the gret aitht suorne Deliuerit and'
furthgaiff all in ane voice concordand that the said patrik had done na
wrang in the occupacioun' and manuring of the said croft

The said day Duncane of fyf was conuict' be the said assis' for strub
lance of thomas menyeis And the said thomas quyt of all strublance of the
said Duncane

The said day johnne colisone grantit that he deliuerit to Johnne robesone
tua barellis of Salmond' in the name of Duncan colisone and' the said
Johnne colisone grantit to releif the said Duncan of the said tua barrellis
of Salmond' at the handis of the said Johnne robesone And Duncan colison'
grantit him avand j barrel of salmond' to John robesoun' and Johne colison' to freith Duncan tharof

The said day William boll grantit that he causit thomas riddaill to wirk
in the schip and' to pay him tharfor samekle' as he maid labour and seruice for

The said day Johnne cuk officiar grantit him dettour for thre stane of
woll to be pait to Johnne of murray and Dauid lam' oblist him to freitht
the said Johnne cuk of the said woll or than' to deliuer Johnne' buchanis
hors' to the said Johnne' cuk /

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
Sexto die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

The said day Androue skynner was conuict be ane suorne assis'
patry lesly forspekar / for the tribulance of Alexander ross' for the
quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court And' the said'
Alexander quyt of ale tribulance of the said' Androw

The said' day the balyes continewit the actioun' debatable' betuix
Johnne of murray and Dauid steuart to this day xv dais witht
consent of baitht the said patrijs in siclik forme and effec as it is
nove but preiudice till ony of the said partiis or to the proces' gangand'
Obefor / et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
spetimo die mensis Septembris Anno quosupra et cetera

The said day Williame scrimgeour and' Androue nauchtj deponit the
gret aitht that thai by stud herd' and sawe and' for witnes was tane
quhene Normond' lesly officiar pundit Duncan colisone for ane barrell
of salmond' aucht to Johne robeson And' thareftir pundit Johnne colisone
to freith the said Duncan of the said barrell of salmond' and the
said Johnne tuk his pundis agane and grantit to pay the said'
barrell of salmond' within xv dais

The said day the bailyes chargit and commandit ale the four officiaris
to pas and pund ale and sindrie the personis quhilkis the names are
gevin to thame in bill for thar mailis and girssomes aving of thar
takis Set to tham' be the commissaris of the said burgh'

The said day the balyes grantit that thai compellit and causit patry
lesly to pay fiwe merkis of grissome aucht be Johnne lesly of Warderis
for ane half nethis fisching of the raik and' failyeing that the sad
fiwe merkis hed' nocht being pait that the said Johnez' tak hed' suld' waik
eftir the tenour of the actis of maid be the haill consaill tharupoun'

Eodem die Johannes robesone fecit constituit nominauit et ordinauit Andream
sanchar suum verum legittimum et Indubitatum procuratorem actorem et factorem ad pro
sequendum et petendum a Jacobo colisone vnam berrillam salmonum promittens de rato et
grato et cetera Et de suis receptis acquitandum agendum et defendendum

Tercio die mensis Septembris Anno quosupra gilbertus menyes deuenit plegius
legalis per manus sue dextere ostensionem quod Johannes colisone et Duncanus co
lisone erunt Indempnes pro Dauid andersone aliter quam per viam Juris dictus
Johannes colisone deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostensionem quod dictus
Dauid erit Indempnis pro dicto Duncano aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus
Duncanus deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostensionem quod dictus Dauid
erit Indempnis pro dicto Johanne aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet eorum
obligatur ad releuandum huiusmodi suos plegios de dicta fideiussione

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die
mensis Septembris Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day the bailyes chargit normund' lesly and Williame scrimgeour
officiaris to pas and tak souerte of thome storour to entir one monunday
that nixt cummis to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Alexander prat
for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xxxiiij s'

The said day Alexander blair oblist him be the faitht of his bodie to
remuf the stanis out of ane pece of land' liand' in futy pertenyng to
the toune als' sone as his corn' beis remuvit and neuir to Intromet thar
with in tyme to cum vndir the pan' of remuving of the toune and' eschet
of ale his gudis at the will of the toune

The said day thomas burro Inglisman grantit that he has ressauit
ane barrell of salmond' of the small bind fra mastir thomas chamer
of his wattir maill and girssome
